name: Penalty Rush
description:
Show that you are the best goalkepper in the world, protect the goal!

Instructions:

-  To protect the goal just get in the ball direction

- Pay attention to the balls in air, you can only catch them by jumping

- Control your jump:

  • Jump up by just pressing the jump key
  • Jump left by  pressing the left key and the jump key
  • Jump right by  pressing the right key and the jump key

This game was made for ScoreSpace Jam #17 🕹️ (Theme: PROTECT)

Controls: 

Left Arrow, Right Arrow, A Key, D Key = Moves left and right

Space, W Key = Jump

Direction + Space, W Key = Jump to Direction

Credits:

  • Music: 8Bit Color Codes Game Music-Vol 1

Thanks for playing!
